titleStmt.title: Die Lunæ, 8 Aprilis, 1644. An ordinance of the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled, for continuance of the excise or new-impost for one whole yeer longer, to commence the eleventh of September next, 1644.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes and John Raworth,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
